page.title: 11A pupil describes Babbacombe
page.content: I live in Babbacombe in a modern semi-detached house.Although there is a large range of local shops most people tend to travel to St.Marychurch,a short walk away,or Torquay town centre,a short bus ride away,for weekly shopping because of the high prices locally.There are also several public houses and a theatre near the shopping area. I go to the theatre about four times a year.It is run by the{TOADS {(Torbay Operatic and Dramatic Society) There are many pleasant open grassy areas by the coast with wonderful views over the bay.There is a{cliff {railway}to take visitors down to the beach.Most of the houses are Victorian and many of the lerge houses have been converted to holiday flats,guest houses or hotels.
